msg: Moving PorletEntity to the root Pluto package, right beside PortletWindow, to indicate it now is one of the root interfaces of the container.

msg: Moving DummyCCPPProfileServiceImpl to the core package as it belong to the default container implementation.

author: ate
msg: With these changes, PortletEntity is no longer tied to InternalPortletPreference and all preferences handling is abstracted away to the core and the PortletPreferencesService
